title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, March 5, 2021
description: "The law has nothing to do with justice, and injustice can't be left unchallenged. So I decided to be a writer” – Leslie Marmon Silko, born this day in 1948
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "The law has nothing to do with justice, and injustice can't be left unchallenged. So I decided to be a writer” – Leslie Marmon Silko, born this day in 1948
